articles.title: Aram and Israel relations
articles.summary: Arameans and the Hebrew Patriarchs have shared origins and marriage ties existed between the peoples.

articles.title: The Kaldu-Arameans in Babylon
articles.summary: Chaldeans are Arameans from the tribe of Kaldu or (Kasdu) conquering and destroying the Assyrian Empire.

articles.title: Interpretation mistakes made in The Chronicle of Michael the Great
articles.summary: Theologian Jean Baptist Chabot releases the first edition of his interpretation of The Chronicle of Michael the Great with misstakes.

articles.title: The language of Turabdin
articles.summary: The Aramaic of Turabdin (Turabdium) is the Aramaic of Urhoy (Edessa). Aramaya became Suryaya and Suryaya became Suryoyo
